description.value:
The rich threads of this tasseled wall hanging show a map of the known world. Close inspection shows paths crisscrossing the map.

Wondrous Item: Uncommon

Properties:

  • To use any of this item's powers, you must carry at least one of its tassels.
  • While you carry a tassel from this tapestry, your path and any terrain you pass through are displayed on the tapestry.

Power ✦ Daily (Minor Action)

Effect: You can send a mental message of up to 25 words to a specific individual viewing the tapestry, or another specific creature that carries a tassel from this tapestry.

Power ✦ Daily (Move Action)

Effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to the tapestry. You must be on the same plane as the tapestry, but the distance is otherwise unlimited. The tassel you carry is destroyed when you use this power.
